Articles.Content:
I don't know why neither my email address nor my username does work with the saved login credentials work for the forum anymore. A little hint would be appreciated. Did you wipe some old accounts?

Anyways.

"Bought" the game on 29.08.2011 (goddness it is that long ago? haha). If I remember correct, it was just a project and the money I have spent was a donation, not an actual price that I had to pay.

 

Years later I am back to try it again after I stumbled over a Youtube video. And thought to myself, give it a try with my new pc and see how much stuff I can launch now before framerate will drop. Back the time it wasn't much, that's for sure.

 

And what did I saw on my account? The two DLC's added to my account for free.

 

That's a nice move. And I appreciate it. If KSP2 really is coming, I will buy it.
nice  and it looks like KSP2 really is coming
